## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATUBC4, UBC4</u>
- **Gene Name:** UBIQUITIN CONJUGATING ENZYME 4, ubiquitin conjugating enzyme 4
- **Description:**   ubiquitin conjugating enzyme 4;(source:Araport11)
